parameter.name: config_2
parameter.label: 2: Blinking Behaviour
parameter.description: This is a double byte value. The LSB defines the total time the device need to blink. The value if set in seconds. The MSB defines the on/off interval of the blinking. The unit is 0.1 s.

parameter.name: config_3
parameter.label: 3: Current Overload Protection
parameter.description: Load will be closed when current more that 15.5A and time more than 2 minutes

parameter.name: config_20

parameter.name: config_81

parameter.description: Parameter to Enable to send notification to associated devices (Group 1) when the state of Micro Smart Switch's load changed

parameter.name: config_91

parameter.description: The value represents the minimum change in Wattage for a Report to be sent.

parameter.name: config_92
parameter.label: 92: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
parameter.description: The value represents the minimum change in Watage Percent for a report to be sent.

parameter.name: config_101
parameter.label: 101: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1
parameter.description: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters. The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1. Therefore if you want all parameters sending regular reports, set the parameter to 15 (8 + 4 + 2 + 1).
